params.name: Token name
params.owner: admin address to be initialized with
params.synapseERC20Address: address of the synapseERC20Address contract to initialize with
params.underlyingChainId: Base asset chain ID which SynapseERC20 represents
params.underlyingTokenAddress: Base asset address which SynapseERC20 represents

returns._0: Address of the newest node management contract created*
